title: Retry build and fix build pipeline failure

requirements.text: Identify the root cause of the current build/pipeline failure and apply the minimal code/config changes required so the project builds successfully end-to-end (frontend build + canister build) without introducing functional regressions.
acceptanceCriteria: A clean build completes successfully with no TypeScript compile errors and no Motoko compile errors.
The app loads to the Home page without a blank screen or runtime crash.
No edits are made to frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.

requirements.text: Add lightweight, developer-facing build-time safeguards to prevent the same build failure from recurring (e.g., ensure any missing imports/exports, missing referenced assets, or invalid route/component lazy imports fail fast with clear errors during build).
acceptanceCriteria: If a referenced static asset path is missing, the issue is surfaced clearly during development/build (not silently at runtime).
No increase in initial page load time is introduced by the safeguards.
The Home page still renders its hero section and existing sections as before.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; only add migration.mo if an upgrade requires state migration.
Do not edit any frontend files under the immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose shadcn/ui components instead of modifying them).
Use English for any new user-facing text introduced as part of this change request (this build request itself is in English; do not translate existing Arabic UI unless explicitly requested).
nonGoals: Adding new product features unrelated to fixing the build failure.
Changing app information architecture, routes, or backend schema unless required to resolve the build failure.
Replacing the existing Arabic UI copy with English across the app.
